Harry:
Grayden explained in a general way
about the request for consultation, but I'd
like to have that spelled out a little more
when you get caught up.
Igot a couple of suggestions as to
who the people were who worried most and I
think I can figure out their concern. But
let's get all the facts and we can solve
the problem.
Mr. Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
National Association of
Educational Broadcasters

Urbana, Illinois
